message.content:
Chef: Here's your medium-rare steak and baked potato, sir. I hope you enjoy!

Customer: Thank you! This dish looks wonderful.

Chef: You're very welcome! If there is anything more that I can do or prepare for you, just let me know. Enjoy!

Customer: Thanks again. Everything looks great so far, but would it be possible to get a side of mushrooms with this?

Chef: Absolutely! Do you prefer sauteed or grilled mushrooms?

Customer: Grilled sounds delicious!

Chef: Excellent choice! I'll have our kitchen provide those as soon as possible for you.

Customer: Great, thank you so much.

(post-meal)

Waiter/Server (not Chef): How was everything today? Did the chef do a fantastic job on your meal?

Customer (to waiter/server): Yes! The meal was sublime - please pass my compliments onto the chef for their amazing work in creating such a delectable dining experience.

Waiter/Server : Will do – they will appreciate hearing about your satisfaction. It’s always an honor when customers enjoy our culinary creations to such extent!
